meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sonia Saraiya Patrick Antle Jessamine Price Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6332.

td.p: Sonia Saraiya, a writer and editor originally from Lutz, Florida
Patrick Antle, a graduate student in chemistry from Billerica, Massachusetts
Jessamine Price, a graduate student in creative writing from Greenbelt, Maryland (whose 3-day cash winnings total $26,803)

tr.td: HISTORICAL BOBBLEHEADS
SLANG
4-LETTER FILM TITLES
SAME-NAMED WRITERS
I'VE GOT THE BREWS
RIVER DAMAGE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This scientist\'s work didn\'t result in slow, gradual change--its impact was revolutionary')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This scientist's work didn't result in slow, gradual change--its impact was revolutionary

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Jessamine: What is...[long pause] what is Jaws?) [her question seems to maybe overlap the time-up signal]
[Alex appears ready to neg Jessamine, then looks at the judges, Patrick attempts to ring in with Jaws at the same time, and the judges determine Jessamine\'s response was just in time.]

Jaws

Jessamine
')

JessaminePatrick
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Jessamine
Patrick
Sonia

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: "Too much of water" because she died by drowning.)
...
(Alex: Stella who?)
(Sonia: I have no idea.)
...
(Alex: Who is [*], from Hamlet, yes. The words were spoken by her brother Laertes.)
[Patrick claps and pumps his fist in the air on learning he is the new champion.]
SoniaWho is Stella
$3,200
PatrickWho is Ophelia?
$8,000
JessamineWho was
$8,601
Ophelia')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'After dying, she\'s described as having "too much of water", & her brother says, "therefore I forbid my tears"')

tr.td: FICTIONAL WOMEN
After dying, she's described as having "too much of water", & her brother says, "therefore I forbid my tears"
Jessamine
Patrick
Sonia
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $22,800
3rd place: $1,000
Jessamine
Patrick
Sonia

22 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W

13 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
